info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 7 at 10:56AM EDT until April 10 at 5:25AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...
East Fork White River.
Big Blue River at Shelbyville.
Flatrock River near Columbus.
Driftwood River near Edinburgh.
.Major flooding will continue on the East Fork White River. The crest on the East Fork was just passing Columbus Monday morning and approaching Seymour. It should reach Rivervale Tuesday night and downriver to Shoals on Thursday. The Big Blue at Shelbyville, the Flatrock near Columbus and the Driftwood at Edinburgh are past crest and falling.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Driftwood River near Edinburgh.
* WHEN...Until early Thursday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Extensive flooding along Driftwood River in northern Bartholomew County and of Double Y Saddle Club area. Tannehill Rd west of bridge and CR 325W south of Lowell Rd are flooded. Water is on or very close to Lowell Rd and the CR 250W intersection east of the bridge. Water is very close or possibly in several residences and seasonal homes along CR 330W and CR 325W. Water is deeper on CR 330W just south of Ohio Ridge Rd and CR 500N west of CR 250W.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EDT Monday the stage was 16.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM EDT Monday was 16.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon and continue falling and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued late tonight by around 200 AM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING

area.areaDesc: Bartholomew, IN; Johnson, IN; Shelby, IN
